item.title: Raichur among three districts in State chosen for Deendayal Jan Ajivik Yojana
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur City Corporation Commissioner Jubin Mohapatra has said that the district has been chosen for the Deendayal Jan Ajivik Yojana under the National Urban Livelihood Mission.
“Under this project, six identified weaker categories should be strengthened with self-employment. Therefore, the officers of the government departments should submit information about registered workers from these categories, inputs and other details within the respective departments in three days,” he added.
He was a...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Karnataka on High Alert After Bird Flu Cases Detected in Bellary, Chikkaballapur, and Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Bengaluru: The Karnataka Health Department has issued a high alert after cases of bird flu (H5N1 avian influenza) were confirmed in Bellary, Chikkaballapur, and Raichur districts, officials said on Friday.
The virus was detected in chickens in Manvi taluk (Raichur), Chikkaballapur taluk, and Sandur taluk (Bellary), leading to several poultry deaths. However, no human infections have been reported so far.
Samples from the affected birds were sent to the Central Laboratory in Bhopal, where tests...]]>
item.author: The Hindustan Gazette
